About Me - Description:
I am a Front-end developer based in Munich, Germany. I enjoy helping designers and companies bring their ideas into real life.
I am looking forward to continuing my developer career with a job in a junior web developer position. 
 
 If you think I’d be a good match for your projects, contact me!
About Me - Description2: If you think I’d be a good match for your projects, contact me!
Portfolio - Header: Feel free to try out my latest development projects and look into their code.

project.join: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
project.el pololoco: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help pepe to find coins and poison bottles to fight against the killer chicken.
project.pokédex: Based on the PokéAPI a simple library that provides and catalogues pokemon information.
